name: Ojamatch
effectText: Send 1 "Ojama" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; add to your hand, 1 "Ojama" monster with a different name, and 1 "Armed Dragon" monster, from your Deck and/or GY, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 of those monsters. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 of your banished "Ojama" monsters; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
